about_the_game:
Grab your backpack, it's time to travel around the world!

In this demo, you will visit New York City, London and Rio de Janeiro.

To finance your travels, apply for jobs in the cities you visit. Why not become a taxi driver, or even a famous football player or Royal Highness! Once you have saved up some money, it's time to bring your luggage and fly off into the unknown once again!

During your hour-or-so of free travels, travelling our beautiful world will surely have awoken the adventurer within you. When that has happened, check out the full version of Voyager, to continue your travels all over the world!
detailed_description:
Grab your backpack, it's time to travel around the world!

In this demo, you will visit New York City, London and Rio de Janeiro.

To finance your travels, apply for jobs in the cities you visit. Why not become a taxi driver, or even a famous football player or Royal Highness! Once you have saved up some money, it's time to bring your luggage and fly off into the unknown once again!

During your hour-or-so of free travels, travelling our beautiful world will surely have awoken the adventurer within you. When that has happened, check out the full version of Voyager, to continue your travels all over the world!

name: Voyager Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Pentium
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum recommended resolution: 1280 x 768. Full game needs 5 GB of disk space, demo needs 2 GB.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Modern processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting OpenGl
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum recommended resolution: 1280 x 768. Full game needs 5 GB of disk space, demo needs 2 GB.

short_description: Visit New York City, Londonand Rio de Janeiro in this free version of Voyager. Don't sunbathe on Copacabana Beach for too long though, as this is also an opportunity for you to learn a thing or two. Have a nice trip!
